item.title: Photography
item.description: As an amateur photographer, I enjoy taking pictures of landscape and wildlife as a way to capture the relationship between humans and the natural environment.

item.title: Climbing
item.description: As an outdoor rock/ice climber, I have hands-on experience on choosing recreation sites and time periods. I have substituted climbing locations and time periods due to changes in site attributes (e.g. weather) and external shocks (e.g. wildfire).

item.title: Traveling
item.description: As an avid traveler, I utilize travel cost models to plan my own trips around the world.
